fieldUpdates.description: Setting the origin field into MINI for cases created with the Web-Form
fieldUpdates.name: Case > Origin > MINI

fieldUpdates.description: Assigning the case created with the web form to the MINI queue
fieldUpdates.name: Case > Owner > MINI queue

fieldUpdates.description: When all Issues related to a Case have been closed, the Case Status automatically changes to "Closed-Solved".
fieldUpdates.name: Case > Status > Closed Solved

rules.description: When all Issues related to a Case have been closed, the Case Status automatically changes to "Closed-solved".
When a case is solved and gets closed, the customer receives an email notification.

rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Status , "Closed"), ISPICKVAL( Contact.PrimaryLanguage__c , "German"), NOT(SuppliedEmail = "noreply@orderbird.com") , OR( RecordTypeId = "01258000000FAvs" , /* General Case */ RecordTypeId = "01258000000FBaH" , /* Issue Damage */ RecordTypeId = "01258000000FBa7" , /* Issue Data */ RecordTypeId = "01258000000FBPc" , /* Issue General */ RecordTypeId = "01258000000FBa2" , /* Issue Invoicing */ RecordTypeId = "01258000000VX2k" , /* Issue Pay */ RecordTypeId = "01258000000FBaM" /* Issue Tech */ ) )

AND( ISPICKVAL(Status , "Closed"), ISPICKVAL( Contact.PrimaryLanguage__c , "English"), NOT(SuppliedEmail = "noreply@orderbird.com") , OR( RecordTypeId = "01258000000FAvs" , /* General Case */ RecordTypeId = "01258000000FBaH" , /* Issue Damage */ RecordTypeId = "01258000000FBa7" , /* Issue Data */ RecordTypeId = "01258000000FBPc" , /* Issue General */ RecordTypeId = "01258000000FBa2" , /* Issue Invoicing */ RecordTypeId = "01258000000VX2k" , /* Issue Pay */ RecordTypeId = "01258000000FBaM" /* Issue Tech */ ) )

AND( ISPICKVAL(Status , "Closed"), ISPICKVAL( Contact.PrimaryLanguage__c , "French"), NOT(SuppliedEmail = "noreply@orderbird.com") , OR( RecordTypeId = "01258000000FAvs" , /* General Case */ RecordTypeId = "01258000000FBaH" , /* Issue Damage */ RecordTypeId = "01258000000FBa7" , /* Issue Data */ RecordTypeId = "01258000000FBPc" , /* Issue General */ RecordTypeId = "01258000000FBa2" , /* Issue Invoicing */ RecordTypeId = "01258000000VX2k" , /* Issue Pay */ RecordTypeId = "01258000000FBaM" /* Issue Tech */ ) )

rules.fullName: Case Close Survey Menu Card DE
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Status , "Closed"), ISPICKVAL( Contact.PrimaryLanguage__c , "German"), NOT(SuppliedEmail = "noreply@orderbird.com") , RecordTypeId = "01258000000FDOe" /* Menu Card */ )

rules.fullName: Case Close Survey Menu Card EN
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Status , "Closed"), ISPICKVAL( Contact.PrimaryLanguage__c , "English"), NOT(SuppliedEmail = "noreply@orderbird.com") , RecordTypeId = "01258000000FDOe" /* Menu Card */ )

rules.fullName: Case Close Survey Menu Card FR
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Status , "Closed"), ISPICKVAL( Contact.PrimaryLanguage__c , "French"), NOT(SuppliedEmail = "noreply@orderbird.com") , RecordTypeId = "01258000000FDOe" /* Menu Card */ )
AND( ISPICKVAL(Status , "Closed"), ISPICKVAL( Contact.PrimaryLanguage__c , "German"), NOT(SuppliedEmail = "noreply@orderbird.com") , RecordTypeId = "01258000000FAvx" /* Onboarding */ )
AND( ISPICKVAL(Status , "Closed"), ISPICKVAL( Contact.PrimaryLanguage__c , "English"), NOT(SuppliedEmail = "noreply@orderbird.com") , RecordTypeId = "01258000000FAvx" /* Onboarding */ )
AND( ISPICKVAL(Status , "Closed"), ISPICKVAL( Contact.PrimaryLanguage__c , "French"), NOT(SuppliedEmail = "noreply@orderbird.com") , RecordTypeId = "01258000000FAvx" /* Onboarding */ )

rules.description: Locks an invisible checkbox "CaseLock" to restrict editing of Cases that are closed for more than 7 days.

rules.formula: OR( CONTAINS( Description , "global@orderbird.com"), BEGINS( Subject , "Erinnerung: [BESTELLBLOCK] Tägliches Arbeiten mit orderbird"), BEGINS( Subject , "Erinnerung: [MANAGER] Einstellungen und Programmieren"), BEGINS( Subject , "Bestätigung - [MANAGER] Einstellungen und Programmieren"), BEGINS( Subject , "Bestätigung - [BESTELLBLOCK] Tägliches Arbeiten mit orderbird") )

rules.description: The priority for freemium customer is automatically and only low.

rules.fullName: Insight Queue Notification Mail on Owner change
rules.description: Sends out an email to inform members of Insight about newly assigned cases

rules.formula: NOW()-CreatedDate=4 && RecordType.Name = "Onboarding Issue: Menue / Backup" && (ISPICKVAL( Status , "Open") || ISPICKVAL( Status , "In Progress"))

rules.description: Sends out an email to inform newly assigned case owner.
When an onboarding case is created, the customer receives an email notification.
Onboarding Case Open more than 30 Days
rules.formula: NOW()-CreatedDate=30 && RecordType.Name = "Case: Onboarding" && (ISPICKVAL( Status , "Open") || ISPICKVAL( Status , "In Progress"))

rules.description: sets a call 1 month from trigger date after an onboarding case successfully closes
Send Mail to German speaking Customers, informing them that their onboarding has been postponed for the time being
Send Mail to English speaking Customers, informing them that their onboarding has been postponed for the time being

rules.fullName: Origin of MINI cases with Web-Form
rules.description: Assigning cases related with MINI to the same Origin
When Case Record Type is „Onboarding“ and Status is „Closed-Solved“ send auto mail "Onboarding Case Closed – Feedback"

rules.formula:
OR ( (RecordTypeId <> "01258000000FAvx" && Cancellation_solution_count__c = 0 && Missing_feature_comment__c <> ""),
(RecordTypeId = "01258000000FAvx" && Cancellation_solution_count__c = 0 && Missing_feature_comment__c <> "" && ISPICKVAL( Status, "Closed") ) )
NOW()-CreatedDate=2 && RecordType.Name = "Onboarding Issue: Welcome Call" && (ISPICKVAL( Status , "Open") || ISPICKVAL( Status , "In Progress"))
